metadata.title: USN-5817-1 -- Setuptools vulnerability
metadata.description: Sebastian Chnelik discovered that setuptools incorrectly handled certain regex inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5817-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-setuptools - 44.1.1-1.2ubuntu0.22.04.1 pypy-setuptools - 44.1.1-1.2ubuntu0.22.04.1 python-pkg-resources - 44.1.1-1.2ubuntu0.22.04.1 pypy-pkg-resources - 44.1.1-1.2ubuntu0.22.04.1 python2-setuptools-whl - 44.1.1-1.2ubuntu0.22.04.1 No subscription required  python-setuptools-doc - 59.6.0-1.2ubuntu0.22.04.1 python3-pkg-resources - 59.6.0-1.2ubuntu0.22.04.1 python3-setuptools - 59.6.0-1.2ubuntu0.22.04.1 python3-setuptools-whl - 59.6.0-1.2ubuntu0.22.04.1 No subscription required
